title: Front Cover
content: Cover caption: An adult bog turtle (Glyptemys muhlenbergii) resting on sphagnum moss in a wetland in the Southern Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia, USA. The cover image relates to Research Article [https://doi.org/10.1002/aqc.4215] “A hydrologic and land cover-based habitat model for use in bog turtle (Glyptemys muhlenbergii) conservation” by Feaga et al. Photo credit: Michael Holden.
siteTitle: Wiley: Aquatic Conservation: Marine and Freshwater Ecosystems: Table of Contents
